reviews.review_msg: Lectures are not organized well. It seems that the prof himeself cannot explain concepts well and assignments are a bit too tough. Anyways, I didn't find the course useful. Who cares programming with old version OpenGL...

His teaching ability sucks. His lecture is like a show off of his research works which will not appear in the exam and assignments. He cannot explain important concept well and lacks the ability of time management. The only Merit is his generousness in grading.
